full_text:
United States v. Jeffrey Epstein
From
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
To
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @steptoe.com, @att.net,
Date
2019/08/10 13:57
Subject:
United States v. Jeffrey Epstein
Attachments:
TEXT.htm, mltC634.pdf
Good afternoon,
Enclosed please find official notification from Warden N'Diaye regarding Mr. Epstein's passing. As the investigation is ongoing, we have no further details at this time. We will continue to keep you updated as more information is available.
Thank you,
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-(b)(6)
f: (646)836-7665
Page 4339
DOJ-OGR-00024362
